title: Death Ring (Part 2)
body:
Death Ring (Part 2)

'Damn, I completely forgot about them.' Evan cursed inwardly when he lost his connection with Eclipse.

He ordered all of his Wyverns to go towards the new army of spiders, meanwhile, he summoned Eclipse using his mana.

All the nineteen Wyverns quickly moved and flew towards the new army.

When Even summoned back Eclipse using mana, he noticed it also reached the peak of A rank.

"What happened?" Although Evan could already guess how it died, he still asked Eclipse after summoning it.

And just as he expected, Eclipse told him that it was killed while fighting against an army of spiders.

According to it, Valery and others faced many spiders after dealing with the people of the dark guild. At first, there were around ten thousand spiders who surrounded them. But because there were not many high ranking spiders among them, they somehow killed all of them.
